channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Shadow mode, drift alerts and audit logs: Inside the modern audit loop
item.description: Traditional software governance often uses static compliance checklists, quarterly audits and after-the-fact reviews. But this method can't keep up with AI systems that change in real time. A machine learning (ML) model might retrain or drift between quarterly operational syncs. This means that, by the time an issue is discovered, hundreds of bad decisions could already have been made. This can be almost impossible to untangle. In the fast-paced world of AI, governance must be inline, not an after-the-fact compliance review. In other words, organizations must adopt what I call an “audit loop":...

item.title: You Have to Watch This ‘Mortal Kombat’ Themed Olympics Performance
item.description: Georgia's figure skating team used their Pairs performance to shout out the fighting franchise and yes, use the 'Mortal Kombat' theme.

item.title: 2026 Olympics: How to watch the Winter Games Closing Ceremony today
item.description:
The Closing Ceremony for the 2026 Winter Games is this Sunday. (Li Jing/Xinhua via Getty Images)
Xinhua News Agency via Getty Images
The 2026 Winter Olympics come to an end this weekend. This year's Closing Ceremony theme is "Beauty in Action." The event will feature appearances from musician and DJ Gabry Ponte, actress Benedetta Porcaroli, and ballet dancer Roberto Bolle. Alfredo Accatino, the ceremony's artistic director, has promised the ceremony will "begin with lots of colors and end with a party." The ceremony will kick off today at 2:30PM ET on NBC and Peacock. An encore br...

item.title: TechCrunch Mobility: Waymo makes its defense
item.description: Welcome back to TechCrunch Mobility — your central hub for news and insights on the future of transportation.

item.title: 'I do think we always have to think about, maybe even worry a little bit about, Chinese subsidies': Microsoft President says US firms should get ready for more competition from China
item.description: Chinese state subsidies give AI companies cost advantages globally, forcing US firms to invest in infrastructure, tools, and developing markets.

item.title: A portable computer in a suitcase: Toshiba's 1982 T100 was nothing like any computer ever launched till then and it even came with a modem and a mechanical keyboard
item.description: A suitcase-style CP/M computer with LCD, modem, and mechanical keyboard - the Toshiba T100 redefined early portable business computing.

item.title: Honor Magic 8 Pro vs Google Pixel 10 : comment choisir le meilleur smartphone premium ?
item.description: Malgré leur étiquette « haut de gamme », on ne peut pas vraiment dire que les Honor Magic 8 Pro et Google Pixel 10 boxent dans la même catégorie. Voyons ce qui les différencie pour vous aider à bien choisir votre nouveau smartphone !

item.title: Cette barre de son 2.1 avec DTS Virtual:X signée Xiaomi booste le son de votre TV pour moins de 170 €
item.description: Xiaomi a pensé aux budgets serrés en lançant sa barre de son Pro 2.1 ch, un modèle abordable qui est tout de même capable de simuler un son surround 3D. Actuellement, la marque la propose à 161,10 euros au lieu de 179 euros.

item.title: China’s brain-computer interface industry is racing ahead
item.description: China’s brain-computer interface industry is rapidly scaling from research to commercialization, driven by strong policy support, expanding clinical trials, and growing investor interest.

item.title: Xenoblade Chronicles X: Definitive Edition’s Switch 2 upgrade is wonderful, and could hint at Monolith Soft’s future on the console
item.description: Xenoblade Chronicles X’s Switch 2 Edition is legitimately definitive, and it could be a sign of things to come for Monolith Soft, its back catalog, and its future.

item.title: Trump says Netflix will ‘pay the consequences’ if it doesn’t fire Susan Rice
item.description: Donald Trump threatened that there would be "consequences" for Netflix if it didn't fire board member Susan Rice. Rice served in both the Obama and Biden administrations, and recently appeared on Preet Bharara's podcast, where she said corporations that "take a knee to Trump" are going to be "caught with more than their pants down. […]

item.title: ‘Face/Off 2’ Director Adam Wingard is Now/Gone
item.description: Does a new director for the 'Face/Off' sequel mean Wingard and co-writer Simon Barrett's idea for it is also DOA?

item.title: How to watch Winter Olympics Closing Ceremony 2026: FREE live streams, schedule, preview
item.description: All the ways to watch Winter Olympics Closing Ceremony 2026 live streams for FREE, as the action in Italy comes to an end
